scripts.start:nia: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'cd packages/core/nia-chat-agent && bash -c "source venv/bin/activate && python api_server.py"'
scripts.start:all:validated: bash scripts/check-ports.sh && bash scripts/fix-file-watchers.sh --auto && ts-node scripts/sync-local-env.ts && ts-node scripts/validate-env.ts && ts-node scripts/ensure-postgres.ts && turbo run dev
scripts.setup:cluster: echo 'K8s cluster setup archived. See archive/infrastructure/ to restore.'
scripts.tidy: npx turbo run clean || true; rm -rf .next dist .clinic .jest-cache coverage performance-reports packages/events/python/build packages/events/python/dist packages/events/python/*.egg-info packages/events/python/.pytest_cache apps/pipecat-daily-bot/ui/dist apps/pipecat-daily-bot/bot/__pycache__ apps/pipecat-daily-bot/bot/.pytest_cache apps/pipecat-daily-bot/bot/.ruff_cache; rm -f packages/features/src/**/*.js packages/features/src/**/*.js.map || true; find packages/features/src -type f '(' -name '*.js' -o -name '*.js.map' ')' -delete || true
scripts.clean: npx turbo run clean || true; rm -rf node_modules dist .clinic .jest-cache coverage performance-reports packages/events/python/build packages/events/python/dist packages/events/python/*.egg-info packages/events/python/.pytest_cache apps/pipecat-daily-bot/ui/dist apps/pipecat-daily-bot/bot/__pycache__ apps/pipecat-daily-bot/bot/.pytest_cache apps/pipecat-daily-bot/bot/.ruff_cache .turbo
scripts.run:apps:dev: concurrently "cd apps/interface && (npm run dev&)" "cd apps/dashboard && (npm run dev&)"
scripts.local:start: NODE_ENV=development npm run pg:db-start-clear && npm run start:all
scripts.local:start:min: NODE_ENV=development npm run pg:db-start-clear && npm run dev -w @nia/mesh-server
scripts.pg:start: echo 'Use local:start for local dev or pg:start:aws to clone from AWS' && npm run local:start
scripts.pg:start:min: echo 'Use local:start:min for minimal local dev' && npm run local:start:min
scripts.pg:start:aws: NODE_ENV=development npm run pg:db-start-clear && npm run pg:db-clone-aws && npm run dev
scripts.pg:restart: NODE_ENV=development npm run pg:db-start && cd apps/mesh && (npm run dev&) && cd ../.. && sleep 2 && npm run run:apps:dev
scripts.pg:stop: ts-node --project ./tsconfig.json ./scripts/stop-all.ts && (NODE_ENV=development npm run pg:db-archive || true) && npm run pg:db-stop
scripts.pg:db-start-clear: npm run pg:db-start && npm run pg:db-clear
scripts.pg:db-clone-aws: echo '⚠️  AWS scripts archived. See archive/scripts/' && ts-node --project ./tsconfig.json ./archive/scripts/clone-aws-db.ts
scripts.pg:db-stop: docker stop nia-postgres 2>/dev/null || echo 'No Docker container running (PostgreSQL may be running directly)'
scripts.docker:build:dashboard: npm run docker:build:web-base && dotenv -e .env.local -- sh -c 'docker build --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://127.0.0.1:4000 -f apps/dashboard/Dockerfile -t nia-dashboard:local .'
scripts.docker:build:interface: npm run docker:build:web-base && dotenv -e .env.local -- sh -c 'docker build -f apps/interface/Dockerfile -t nia-interface:local .'
scripts.docker:build:pipecat-daily-bot: dotenv -e apps/pipecat-daily-bot/.env -- sh -c 'docker build -f apps/pipecat-daily-bot/Dockerfile -t nia-pipecat-daily-bot:local apps/pipecat-daily-bot/'
scripts.docker:build:all: npm run docker:build:dashboard && npm run docker:build:interface && npm run docker:build:mesh && npm run docker:build:pipecat-daily-bot
scripts.trivy:scan:web: bash -lc 'set -e; npm run trivy:scan -w dashboard; npm run trivy:scan -w interface'
scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm --workspace pipecat-daily-bot run test && npm run coverage:merge
scripts.test:perf: PERF_WRAP_ACTIONS=true PERF_WRAP_DATA_BRIDGE=true PERF_FN_METRICS=true NODE_ENV=test jest --detectOpenHandles --maxWorkers=1 --config jest.performance.config.mjs
scripts.test:perf:single: PERF_WRAP_ACTIONS=true PERF_WRAP_DATA_BRIDGE=true PERF_FN_METRICS=true NODE_ENV=test jest --detectOpenHandles --maxWorkers=1 --config jest.performance.config.mjs --testNamePattern
scripts.test:profile: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true PERF_FN_METRICS=true NODE_ENV=development node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic.cjs doctor
scripts.test:profile:short: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true NODE_ENV=development AC_WARMUP=1 AC_DURATION=1 AC_CONCURRENCY=5 node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic.cjs doctor
scripts.test:profile:short:fn: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true PERF_FN_METRICS=true NODE_ENV=development AC_WARMUP=1 AC_DURATION=1 AC_CONCURRENCY=5 node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic.cjs doctor
scripts.test:profile:short:prod:fn: NODE_ENV=production PERF_FN_METRICS=true AC_WARMUP=1 AC_DURATION=1 AC_CONCURRENCY=5 node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic.cjs doctor
scripts.test:profile:filtered: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true PERF_FN_METRICS=true NODE_ENV=development AC_WARMUP=5 AC_DURATION=10 AC_CONCURRENCY=20 node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic-filtered.cjs doctor
scripts.test:profile:filtered:short: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true NODE_ENV=development AC_WARMUP=1 AC_DURATION=5 AC_CONCURRENCY=10 node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic-filtered.cjs doctor
scripts.test:flamegraph: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true NODE_ENV=development PERF_FN_METRICS=true node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic.cjs flame
scripts.test:flamegraph:short: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true NODE_ENV=development PERF_FN_METRICS=true AC_WARMUP=1 AC_DURATION=1 AC_CONCURRENCY=5 node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic.cjs flame
scripts.test:flamegraph:filtered: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true NODE_ENV=development PERF_FN_METRICS=true AC_WARMUP=5 AC_DURATION=10 AC_CONCURRENCY=20 node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic-filtered.cjs flame
scripts.test:flamegraph:filtered:short: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true NODE_ENV=development PERF_FN_METRICS=true AC_WARMUP=1 AC_DURATION=5 AC_CONCURRENCY=10 node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic-filtered.cjs flame
scripts.test:flamegraph:save: PROFILE_DEV=true NODE_ENV=development PERF_FN_METRICS=true node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic.cjs flame --dest ./performance-reports/clinic
scripts.test:autocannon: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true PROFILE_DEV=true NODE_ENV=development PERF_FN_METRICS=true node tests/stress-tests/run-clinic.cjs
scripts.test:heapsnapshot: FORCE_SUPERADMIN_SESSION=true NODE_ENV=development AC_WARMUP=1 AC_DURATION=10 AC_CONCURRENCY=5 node --heap-prof tests/stress-tests/interface-next-server.cjs
scripts.test:cleanup: docker rm -f test-postgres || true && docker network rm scripts_default || true && docker volume rm scripts_postgres_data || true
scripts.report:stg: echo '⚠️  Reporting scripts require AWS CloudWatch. See archive/scripts/'
scripts.report:prod: echo '⚠️  Reporting scripts require AWS CloudWatch. See archive/scripts/'
